translation.en: -[male announcer] Are you ready? -[cheering]
I said, "Are you ready, Woodbright High?"
translation.zh:
‎我问你们呢
‎“准备好了吗 亮木高中？”

translation.en: Give it up for the reigning champions of the Work It Dance Competition,
translation.zh: ‎掌声献给飙舞追梦大赛的卫冕冠军

translation.en: your very own Thunderbirds!
[girl] Albert Einstein once said that dancers are the athletes of God.
translation.zh:
‎阿尔伯特爱因斯坦曾说
‎舞者是上帝的运动员

translation.en: Kim Kardashian once said, "Lighting is everything."
translation.zh: ‎金卡戴珊曾说 “灯光就是一切”

translation.en: And as head of the AV club, I had to agree.
translation.zh:
‎作为影音俱乐部的负责人
‎我不得不同意

translation.en: Sometimes I wonder,
translation.zh:
‎有时候 我会想
‎如果爱因斯坦现在还活着

translation.en: if Einstein were alive today, would he have even gotten into college?
translation.zh:
‎有时候 我会想
‎如果爱因斯坦现在还活着 ‎他能进大学吗？

translation.en: I mean, sure, he was good at math and science,
translation.zh: ‎我是说 没错 他擅长数学和科学

translation.en: but did he have extracurriculars?
These days, great colleges want a little bit of everything,
translation.zh: ‎如今 优秀的大学都要求面面俱到

translation.en: and I thought I had it all on lock.
I started my mornings with a TED Talk,
translation.zh: ‎每天醒来第一件事 就是看TED演讲

translation.en: because who doesn't love a good life hack?
translation.zh: ‎谁不喜欢提高生活质量的好建议呢？

translation.en: [Female TED Talker] And that is why cold showers -are empirically more effec-- -[gasps]
[girl] I ride to school every day with my best friend, Jas.
translation.zh: ‎然后我会坐闺蜜杰斯的车去上学

translation.en: Come on, hurry up! I have a bio test to fail.
translation.zh: ‎快点啦！我有生物考试 等着挂科呢

translation.en: [girl] We've been inseparable since kindergarten, when she gave this kid a wedgie
translation.zh:
‎从幼儿园起 我们就形影不离
‎她用鞋底抽了一个同学

translation.en: for making fun of my Bill Nye the Science Guy lunch box.
translation.zh:
‎因为那人嘲笑
‎我的《比尔教科学》饭盒

translation.en: Jas isn't too worried about grades,
because she's gonna be a professional dancer.
translation.zh: ‎因为她要成为一名专业舞者

translation.en: [girl] While Jas was twerking up a storm,
I was building an impressive college résumé
translation.zh: ‎而我在打造漂亮的大学申请简历

translation.en: with a well-calculated assortment of AP classes,
translation.zh:
‎参加精心设计的各类预科课程
‎加入学生会

translation.en: student government, and I even volunteered at a local nursing home.
translation.zh:
‎参加精心设计的各类预科课程
‎加入学生会 ‎甚至在当地的养老院做志愿者

translation.en: Anything to make my application fully rejection-proof.
Okay, so I didn't have a boyfriend or a car or a bustling social calendar,
translation.zh:
‎好吧 所以我没有男友 没有车
‎也没有繁忙的社交安排

translation.en: but it was all gonna pay off when I got into my dream school, Duke University.
translation.zh: ‎但这一切都会有回报的 ‎我要进入我的梦想学校 杜克大学

translation.en: I thought I had it all figured out,
until one day, everything kind of spun out of control.
translation.zh: ‎直到有一天 一切都失去控制了

translation.en: That was a great show today, guys.
translation.zh: ‎今天的表演很精彩 伙计们

translation.en: I thought it was one of our better ones, actually.
translation.zh: ‎说实话 我觉得这次算发挥很棒的

translation.en: There was, like, a couple kinks in there, but,
translation.zh: ‎有几个小问题 但你们懂的

translation.en: you know, we'll just work on all that moving forward.
translation.zh: ‎我们会继续努力 多向前看

translation.en: Overall, I-I'm extremely happy.
Brit's hair was singed.
She's probably gonna have to get bangs now,
and she does not have the face for that.
-Look, Isaiah, I-- -[dancers gasp]
I mean, Juilliard.
I can assure you it was an accident.
translation.zh: ‎我可以跟你保证 那只是一次意外

translation.en: You know, the Work It Competition is in five months,
translation.zh: ‎距离飙舞追梦大赛还有五个月

translation.en: and it is my responsibility to lead our team to a fourth consecutive victory.
translation.zh:
‎我有责任
‎带领我们的舞团取得四连胜

translation.en: Do you understand?
You know, when people hear the name "Woodbright High," they think this.
translation.zh:
‎要知道 人们听到“亮木高中”
‎就会想到这张脸

translation.en: -The Thunderbirds. -It won't happen again.
Of course it won't, 'cause you're off the light board.
translation.zh: ‎当然 因为你不再负责灯光了

translation.en: Brit, can you call Chris Chu?
translation.zh:
‎-布瑞特 你能打给克里斯楚吗？
‎-克里斯楚？

translation.en: Chris Chu? You can't replace me with Chris Chu.
translation.zh:
‎-布瑞特 你能打给克里斯楚吗？
‎-克里斯楚？ ‎你不能用克里斯楚换掉我呀
‎他会的东西 都是我教的

translation.en: I taught Chris Chu everything he knows.
translation.zh:
‎你不能用克里斯楚换掉我呀
‎他会的东西 都是我教的

translation.en: -It's ringing. -Juilliard, please, you can't do this.
translation.zh:
‎-打通了
‎-茱莉亚 拜托 你不能这样做

translation.en: Look, I'm so sorry.
Honestly, Quinn, I don't accept your apology,
translation.zh: ‎说实话 奎因 我不接受你的道歉

translation.en: I'd like you to pack your things and clear out your locker.
translation.zh: ‎我希望你赶紧打包 把更衣柜腾空了

translation.en: You can't expel me. We're in the same French class.
translation.zh: ‎你不能开除我 我们在同一个法语班

translation.en: Baby, you're canceled.
-What? -You're deleted. You're unsubscribed.
translation.zh:
‎-什么？
‎-你被删除了 你被退订了

translation.en: Control, alt, delete.
I don't understand.
You are banished from this room. Do you understand that?
translation.zh: ‎不允许你再进入这间屋子了 ‎这次明白了吧？

translation.en: [Quinn] You're probably wondering, why Duke? Why not Yale or Penn
translation.zh: ‎你们可能会想 为什么选杜克大学？ ‎怎么不选耶鲁 或者宾大

translation.en: or Harvard?
Although, fun fact, Duke is the Harvard of the South.
translation.zh: ‎不过有趣的是 杜克就是南方的哈佛

translation.en: [mom] Quinn, wake up! Today's the day! Duke interview!
translation.zh:
‎奎因 醒醒！
‎今天是杜克大学面试的日子！

translation.en: [Quinn] My dad went there,
so I grew up going to football games and alumni events,
translation.zh: ‎我从小就参加橄榄球比赛和校友活动

translation.en: and… I don't know, it just feels like home.
translation.zh: ‎所以…我也说不好 那里感觉像家一样

translation.en: You know, if home had less than a six percent acceptance rate.
translation.zh: ‎你懂的 如果家的录取率不到6%的话

translation.en: Strengths?
Intensity, intelligence, drive, compassion.
translation.zh: ‎认真 睿智 积极 善良

translation.en: Weaknesses?
Single-mindedness… which, if you think about it, can be a strength.
translation.zh: ‎死心眼… ‎如果细想一下 也可以算作优势

translation.en: This is just the first step. Pretty soon, you'll be premed,
translation.zh:
‎这只是第一步 ‎你很快就会成为医学预科生
‎然后成为奎因医生

translation.en: and then you'll be Dr. Quinn.
translation.zh:
‎你很快就会成为医学预科生
‎然后成为奎因医生

translation.en: Okay, all right. I'm gonna focus now.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我要先专心面试了

translation.en: -[mom] Okay. -Okay.
[mom] I love ya.
Mom. Mom! What are you doing?
I'm putting you in the zone with my pump-up jam.
translation.zh: ‎我要用我的鼓劲音乐 帮你进入状态

translation.en: This is the jam I put on when I need to get pumped up.
translation.zh: ‎当我需要加油鼓劲时 我就放这首歌

translation.en: Did you bring this
-just for this moment? -Bet your ass I did.
translation.zh: ‎你特意准备了这首歌吗？ ‎那是肯定的

translation.en: -That's nice. That's cool. -[mom] Mm-hm.
Fun. All right. All right, we're good.
translation.zh: ‎很好玩 好了 可以了

translation.en: Mom, people-- people can see us.
translation.zh: ‎妈妈 大家能看到我们的

translation.en: -People are watching. -'Cause they're jealous.
translation.zh:
‎-别人在看着呢
‎-那是他们嫉妒

translation.en: Now they're looking at me -because they're looking at you. -♪ Stand up and make it happen ♪
translation.zh: ‎他们在看你 也在顺道看我呢

translation.en: -Quinn. -Mom.
-[mom] 'Kay, I love you. Love you!
-[door shuts] -[mom] Even though you don't say it, I know you love me.
translation.zh: ‎即使你不说 我也知道你爱我

translation.en: -[music fades] -I'm first in my class.
I am a National Merit scholar, 4.0 GPA.
translation.zh: ‎得过优秀学生奖学金 ‎平均成绩4.0

translation.en: I volunteer three afternoons a week at a local nursing home near my house.
translation.zh:
‎每周有三天的下午
‎去我家附近的养老院做志愿者

translation.en: I'm also student government treasurer.
-Did I mention head of the AV club? -I'm gonna stop you right there.
translation.zh: ‎我说我是影音娱乐部负责人了吗？ ‎我先打断你一下

translation.en: Student government. AV club. Volunteering.
translation.zh: ‎学生会 影音俱乐部 志愿者

translation.en: -All applicants, nearly identical. -But do they also play the cello?
translation.zh: ‎所有申请者几乎一模一样 ‎但他们也会拉大提琴吗？

translation.en: Yes, everybody plays the cello. And nobody likes playing the cello.
translation.zh:
‎是的 每个人都会
‎但没有人喜欢拉大提琴

translation.en: I love the cello.
Can you do for the cello what Lizzo does for the flute?
translation.zh: ‎你能像莉佐用长笛那样拉大提琴吗？

translation.en: No.
What are you passionate about? What gets you out of bed in the morning?
translation.zh:
‎你热爱什么？
‎是什么让你有动力起床的？

translation.en: TED Talks.
Oh, girl, that's sad. Squirrel friend, are you for real?
translation.zh: ‎姑娘 那也太悲哀了 你是说真的吗？

translation.en: Have you read a newspaper lately or even looked at the news?
translation.zh: ‎你最近读过报纸吗 看过新闻吗？

translation.en: The world is burning.
I am looking for applicants that are change-makers, risk-takers.
translation.zh:
‎我想要那些
‎能够改变 敢于冒险的申请者

translation.en: You know what I mean?
Not applicants that just, like, can fill the box.
translation.zh: ‎不是那种把盒子装满的申请者

translation.en: I want an applicant to blow the box up.
translation.zh: ‎而是能把盒子炸掉的申请者

translation.en: Yeah.
Look, I am just trying to figure out who you are, who you really are.
translation.zh:
‎听着 我只想弄清楚你是谁
‎你到底是什么样

translation.en: What's your passion? What are you passionate about?
Passion.
Duke.
That's sad, unless it's a guy named Duke that's really hot, okay?
translation.zh:
‎-杜克
‎-太悲哀了 ‎除非是一个叫做杜克的帅哥 好吗？

translation.en: Because it's just a school.
It's just walls.
It's not passion.
You know what? This was very fun. Thank you so much for coming in.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 跟你聊得很开心 感谢你来面试

translation.en: No, wait, please, Ms. Ramirez…
translation.zh: ‎不要 等等 拉米雷兹老师…

translation.en: this is all I've ever wanted.
You see, my dad…
he went here, and he died when I was 12.
translation.zh: ‎他就是校友 在我12岁时 他过世了

translation.en: And my mom's had to work two jobs just to support us.
translation.zh: ‎我母亲要做两份工作养家糊口

translation.en: What school do you go to?
-Woodbright High. -Woodbright High?
Oh, isn't that the school with the dance team?
translation.zh: ‎你们学校是不是有一个舞团

translation.en: With the birds or something that was on Ellen?
translation.zh: ‎叫什么鸟来着 还上过艾伦的节目？

translation.en: Yeah, they…
Yes… we were, after winning the Work It Dance Competition last year.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 得到飙舞追梦大赛冠军后
‎我们上过她的节目

translation.en: Well, this is just fascinating.
I had no idea you were part of the dance team.
I'm a-- I'm a contributor.
That's excellent. What's your style?
-I'm sorry? -Your style of dance, honey.
translation.zh:
‎-什么意思？
‎-你的舞蹈风格 宝贝

translation.en: Are you a breaker?
Are you a wall climber?
Are you into Zumba? You just put on some neon shorts and just do a grapevine?
translation.zh:
‎还是尊巴舞？
‎穿上闪亮短裤 然后跳葡萄藤舞步？

translation.en: What kind of dance do you do?
-I'm an i-illuminator. -Sorry?
An illuminator.
Ooh, illuminator. I've never heard of that before.
translation.zh: ‎照明者 我以前从没听说过

translation.en: That must be really something. What do you do?
translation.zh: ‎肯定确有其职吧 你具体做什么？

translation.en: I just… I-I keep it lit, you know.
translation.zh: ‎我给舞台带来光明 你懂的

translation.en: I definitely misread you, Ms. Ackerman.
translation.zh: ‎我真是误解你了 艾克曼小姐

translation.en: I mean, dance team?
That takes emotion, power, grit. Here I thought you were all just, like,
translation.zh: ‎那需要情感、力量和勇气 ‎我以为你只有简历和成绩单呢

translation.en: résumés and transcripts.
translation.zh: ‎我以为你只有简历和成绩单呢

translation.en: You're the most exciting applicant I've seen this week.
translation.zh: ‎你是这周最让人激动的申请者了

translation.en: I'm so happy. I will see you at the Work It Dance Competition,
translation.zh: ‎我好开心 ‎我们在飙舞追梦大赛见吧

translation.en: -okay? -You're going?
Hell yes! I wouldn't miss it.
So, what did you talk about?
You were in there for such a long time, Quinn.
translation.zh: ‎你在里面呆了很久呢 奎因

translation.en: -Just school and stuff. -School and stuff? [gibbers]
translation.zh: ‎聊聊学校什么的 ‎学校什么的？拜托！仔细说说呗

translation.en: Come on! Give me more than that. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎学校什么的？拜托！仔细说说呗

translation.en: Oh, did you tell her that you wanted to go premed?
translation.zh: ‎你告诉她 你想读医学预科了吗？

translation.en: -Mm-hm. -Yeah? Was she impressed?
-Yeah. -Yeah? 'Course she was.
I told you she'd be impressed.
Okay, what else? What else did you talk about?
She... You know, I vaguely remember her saying, uh,
that I would make a great addition to the Duke family
translation.zh: ‎我会成为杜克大家庭的一员

translation.en: and to keep up the good work.
Oh my God. You're a shoo-in. You're a shoo-in. I knew it!
translation.zh:
‎天啊 你稳操胜券了 我就知道！
‎我太为你骄傲了

translation.en: -I am so proud of you. -Oh, great. [grunting]
translation.zh:
‎天啊 你稳操胜券了 我就知道！
‎我太为你骄傲了 ‎太好了

translation.en: [Quinn] "Dear Ms. Ramirez,
Winston Churchill once said,
'The price for greatness is responsibility.'
So, I'm taking responsibility for my actions.
translation.zh: ‎所以我要对自己的行为负责

translation.en: I wasn't entirely honest with you when I said I was a Thunderbird.
translation.zh:
‎我说自己是雷鸟舞团成员时
‎没有对您完全诚实

translation.en: Hey. Hey, can I talk to you for a minute?
Make it quick, honey.
Okay. So, I've been thinking about the routine for Work It, and…
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我在考虑飙舞追梦大赛的动作

translation.en: Well, I was hoping I could be featured.
There's gonna be a lot of recruiters there--
translation.zh: ‎到时会有很多招生老师来看比赛

translation.en: Everybody knows that the recruiters are coming
translation.zh: ‎人人都知道 那些招生老师

translation.en: to see me lead the Thunderbirds to victory.
translation.zh: ‎都是来看我带领雷鸟夺冠的

translation.en: Okay.
Well, uh…
I actually think I'm just as good as you are.
-Oh, really? -Mmm… maybe better.
[Jas] Let's go then.
[Jas] Come on! Come on!
Sashay away, Jasmine. You won't ever be on my level.
translation.zh: ‎走远点吧 杰斯明 ‎你达不到我的水平的

translation.en: Never.
[Quinn] So, I had to join the dance team. Me.
A girl who couldn't find her own heartbeat,
translation.zh: ‎我连自己的心跳节拍都找不准

translation.en: let alone a four-count.
When I was five, my mom enrolled me in a ballet class,
translation.zh: ‎五岁时 妈妈给我报了一个芭蕾舞班

translation.en: and I single-handedly ruined our recital.
translation.zh: ‎结果我们的演出 被我一手毁掉了

translation.en: But if there's one thing I am good at, it's studying.
translation.zh: ‎但要说我擅长什么 那就是学习

translation.en: I just needed the right teacher.
-Hey! -Whoa! Jeez, you scared me. What?
translation.zh:
‎-嘿！
‎-天啊 吓到我了 怎么了？

translation.en: I need to ask you something, and it's gonna sound absurd at first,
translation.zh:
‎我要问你一件事
‎可能初听起来有点荒谬

translation.en: -but I just need you to bear with me. -No no. Mm-mm.
I am not helping with your science project again,
translation.zh: ‎我不会再帮你做科学项目了

translation.en: -not after you electrocuted me last year. -It was a very low voltage.
translation.zh:
‎-你去年差点把我电死
‎-那电压很低的！

translation.en: Dude, I couldn't feel my pinkie for a week!
translation.zh: ‎拜托 我的小手指一周都没知觉！

translation.en: Okay, I need you to help me get on the Thunderbirds.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 我需要你帮我加入雷鸟舞团

translation.en: You mean, like, back on the light board?
translation.zh: ‎你是说 重新负责灯光吗？

translation.en: No, I mean, like, as a dancer.
translation.zh: ‎不 我是说 作为舞者加入

translation.en: [laughs] That's a good one.
Why aren't you laughing? Dude, you don't dance.
-[chuckles] I don't dance yet. -You don't dance at all.
translation.zh:
‎-目前不会而已
‎-你根本不跳舞的！

translation.en: Remember we had a conversation about flossing
and you thought I was talking about oral hygiene?
translation.zh: ‎你还以为我在说口腔卫生呢

translation.en: -We weren't talking about oral hygiene? -No, we weren't!
translation.zh:
‎-难道不是在说口腔卫生吗？
‎-不是！

translation.en: Look... I really screwed up my Duke interview,
translation.zh: ‎听着 我把杜克大学的面试搞砸了

translation.en: and I may have led the admissions lady to believe that I'm a Thunderbird.
translation.zh:
‎我让招生老师
‎误以为我是雷鸟的成员了

translation.en: [laughs] What? Why would-- Why would you do that?
I-I don't know! She-she kept saying that she wanted to shake things up,
translation.zh:
‎我也不知道！
‎她总是说 想看到大胆变革的人

translation.en: and it turns out that I'm a boring robot with no personal context,
translation.zh:
‎结果发现我是一个无聊的机器人
‎没有个人情感

translation.en: and cellos are basic.
-And Duke doesn't want boring people. -Well, screw them, all right? Don't go.
translation.zh: ‎杜克大学不想要无聊的人 ‎那就拉倒呗 好吗？别去那里了

translation.en: Jas, how are your grades?
Terrible. You know this.
Yes. So, what if New York Dance Academy wouldn't take you unless you had a 4.0?
translation.zh:
‎好的 如果你的成绩不到4.0
‎纽约舞蹈学院就不录取你呢？

translation.en: Probably cry a little bit, and then I'd crack them damn books.
translation.zh: ‎也许哭几场 ‎然后开始好好啃书

translation.en: Yeah, exactly, and I would help you.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 没错 而我会帮你

translation.en: But guess what? I have the exact opposite problem.
translation.zh: ‎但你猜怎么着？我有完全相反的问题

translation.en: I have a 4.0 GPA, and I need you to teach me how to dance.
translation.zh: ‎我的成绩是4.0 但我需要你教我跳舞

translation.en: Quinn, auditions are in two weeks, and more importantly, Juilliard hates you.
translation.zh:
‎奎因 距离招募海选还有两周
‎更重要的是 茱莉亚讨厌你

translation.en: Look, if I'm undeniable, he has no choice but to take me.
translation.zh:
‎如果我足够优秀 他就只能让我加入
‎杰斯 帮帮我吧

translation.en: Jas, please help me. I know you can do this.
translation.zh:
‎如果我足够优秀 他就只能让我加入
‎杰斯 帮帮我吧 ‎我知道你可以的

translation.en: You should've seen my mom's face after the interview.
translation.zh: ‎你应该看看面试以后 我妈妈的表情

translation.en: -How did she look at you? -It was sorta like…
translation.zh: ‎她是怎么看你的？ ‎差不多像这样…

translation.en: I hate that. Stop that right now. That is terrifying.
translation.zh: ‎太讨厌了 别再学了 太吓人了

translation.en: -Where are your eyeballs going? Stop. -Not till you say yes.
translation.zh:
‎-你的眼球去哪了？别学了
‎-那你先答应我

translation.en: Quinn, stop! Stop! Stop! Okay, fine!
translation.zh: ‎奎因 快停吧！好吧 可以！

translation.en: -Fine, yes. -Yes?
Sorry, takes a second to get out of it. Okay.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 让我缓缓 好了

translation.en: Where were you? Were you in the Upside Down?
translation.zh: ‎你去哪里了？ ‎《怪奇物语》的颠倒王国吗？

translation.en: God, I'm good.
-Yes! -Yeah!
-[music ends] -[phone chimes, buzzes]
How many of you woke up this morning thinking,
translation.zh: ‎你们当中有多少人 早上醒来会想

translation.en: "Today is the day that I become a Bird"?
translation.zh: ‎“今天我就要变成一只雷鸟了”？

translation.en: That was a question. Please raise your hands.
Well, I got some hard news for you.
We only have room in the crew for one of you.
translation.zh: ‎我们的舞团 只能再招募一个人

translation.en: The rest of you are going home.
Whoa. Ew, what are you doing here?
I banished you.
Trinity, can you sage the space?
translation.zh: ‎崔尼蒂 你能来焚香辟秽吗？

translation.en: [whispers] Hi.
[normal voice] It's-- It's Quinn… Ackerman.
Yes?
You-- [coughs] You banished me from the lighting booth,
but I'm-I'm here to audition.
To dance? You?
[giggles] Yeah.
Well, Quinn Ackerman…
you're up first, honey.
Five, six, seven, eight.
Should I sage the space again?
Okay.
Okay, I know I suck.
But-- But I tried.
I couldn't dance at all before, and that-- that wasn't my best--
translation.zh:
‎我以前完全不会跳舞
‎我刚没发挥最佳水平…

translation.en: She can't dance at all now.
Please! You don't understand. I really need this.
translation.zh: ‎求你了 你不明白 我很需要加入

translation.en: -Jas-- -[Juilliard] Don't look at her.
-It's not her team. It's my team. -It wasn't that bad.
translation.zh:
‎-这是我的舞团 不是她的
‎-也没那么糟吧

translation.en: [scoffs] Come on. You saw what I saw.
She's got talent. She just needs some nurturing.
translation.zh: ‎她很有天赋的 ‎只是需要好好培养

translation.en: Absolutely not.
Look, she really does need this.
Well then, she can start her own damn team for all I care.
Okay.
Fine.
I will start my own damn team then.
[scoffs] Well, best of luck.
Everyone, where were we?
translation.zh: ‎各位 我们刚进行到哪了？

translation.en: And my team will be all about building people up.
translation.zh: ‎我的舞团将致力于培养人才

translation.en: Oh. This is still happening?
And you know what?
Jas is gonna be my captain.
There it is.
Say what?
-[Quinn] Jas? -[Jas] No.
-Jas! -I'm not gonna--
Quinn, what are you doing?
How much fun did we have dancing together these past two weeks?
translation.zh: ‎过去两周 我们一起跳舞 你开心吗？

translation.en: You don't want to dance for him.
Okay, now you're starting to piss me off. She isn't going with you.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 你们已经开始惹到我了 ‎她不会跟你走的 她属于这里

translation.en: She's staying here.
translation.zh: ‎她不会跟你走的 她属于这里

translation.en: What side of history do you want to be on?
We have no dancers.
We will find dancers.
I promise you we can do this.
translation.zh: ‎我跟你保证 我们可以的

translation.en: There's never been another dance team at this school.
translation.zh: ‎这所学校从没有过其他舞团

translation.en: We can't lose Jas.
She's fire.
No, she's not. She's completely overrated.
translation.zh: ‎才不是呢 她是被高估了

translation.en: Jas doesn't know one thing about fire.
Quinn, you better be serious about this.
[whispers] My God.
That was the coolest thing I've ever done.
Oh my God. I can't believe that just happened.
translation.zh: ‎我的天啊 不敢相信刚才发生的事

translation.en: Honestly, neither can I.
No, no, no, no. I'm going back in there.
No, you can't. You lost his trust. You can't go back now.
translation.zh: ‎不行 你失去他的信任了 不能回去了

translation.en: Dude, this may be the dumbest thing I've ever done.
translation.zh: ‎这可能是我做过的最愚蠢的事了

translation.en: No, what about the sexting incident with that guy Eugene?
translation.zh:
‎不 那跟那个叫尤金的家伙
‎聊骚短信事件呢？

translation.en: Okay, the second dumbest thing I've ever done.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 那就是第二蠢的事

translation.en: -Why do I feel so nauseous? -Hey, calm down! It's gonna be okay.
translation.zh:
‎-我为什么觉得恶心呢？
‎-冷静下来！一切都会好起来的

translation.en: No, Quinn, I don't think you understand.
translation.zh: ‎不 奎因 我觉得你没明白

translation.en: A recruiter from the New York Dance Academy
is going to be at Work It,
which means I need to be there on that stage, killing it.
translation.zh: ‎这意味着 我要登台飙舞 出色发挥

translation.en: You will be. I promise.
Okay, can I get that in writing, please?
translation.zh: ‎好吧 你能做书面保证吗？

translation.en: Listen, you just need to sit back,
translation.zh: ‎听着 你只需要坐好 放轻松

translation.en: relax, and let me do what I do best.
translation.zh: ‎听着 你只需要坐好 放轻松 ‎让我来做我最擅长的吧

translation.en: -Which is what? Stress me out? -No.
translation.zh:
‎-你擅长什么 让我紧张吗？
‎-不是

translation.en: Research and organization.
Okay, yeah, both of those words stress me out.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 这俩词都让我好紧张

translation.en: I've gathered up the ingredients we need to make an award-winning dance team.
translation.zh:
‎我已经收集到
‎组成一支冠军舞团的要素了

translation.en: We need an incredible DJ for music,
we need a flipper, someone with really great power moves,
translation.zh:
‎需要空翻舞者
‎能做出高难度动作的人

translation.en: and most importantly, we need an amazing choreographer.
translation.zh:
‎最重要的是
‎我们需要一位出色的编舞

translation.en: So, I've been looking at the previous competition winners,
translation.zh: ‎我一直在看之前的比赛冠军

translation.en: and it's this guy, Jake Taylor.
translation.zh: ‎发现了这个人 杰克泰勒

translation.en: He captained the winning team three years in a row.
translation.zh: ‎他连续三年担任获胜舞团的队长

translation.en: Maybe we could get him to choreograph for us.
translation.zh: ‎也许我们可以请他为我们编舞

translation.en: Yeah, Quinn, everybody knows Jake Taylor, all right?
translation.zh:
‎是啊 奎因
‎人人都认识杰克泰勒 好吗？

translation.en: He was the best dancer in the state until he tore his ACL.
translation.zh:
‎他是全州最好的舞者
‎直到他拉伤了前交叉韧带

translation.en: No one has seen or heard from him in, like, two years.
We'd have a better chance at building a time machine
translation.zh: ‎我们更有可能制造一个时间机器

translation.en: and kidnapping a young Channing Tatum.
translation.zh: ‎然后绑架年轻的查宁塔图姆

translation.en: -I found him. -[Jas] What? How?
translation.zh:
‎-我找到他了
‎-什么？怎么找到的？

translation.en: I checked his old Instagram,
checked all his geo-tags, and from there, it was just a simple mapping.
translation.zh:
‎看了他的地理标签
‎然后简单绘制一下就搞定了

translation.en: Well, damn, Nancy Drew.
And now all we have to do is convince him.
translation.zh: ‎现在我们要做的 就是去说服他

translation.en: Convince this hot stranger you stalked to coach your non-existent dance team.
translation.zh:
‎说服你跟踪到的牛逼陌生人
‎让他指导不存在的舞团

translation.en: Yeah, pretty much.
I'm sure Jake Taylor is onto much bigger and better things.
translation.zh:
‎我相信杰克泰勒
‎在做更重要更靠谱的事

translation.en: -[boy] What was your favorite dance move? -[girl] Um, probably the one where…
translation.zh:
‎-那是你最喜欢的舞步吗？
‎-是啊…差不多吧…

translation.en: [boy] Yeah.
Are you-- Are you Jake Taylor?
Depends on who's asking.
Right. Um, I-I'm Quinn…
Ackerman.
And I'm starting a dance team at Woodbright High.
-I'm not interested. -So I just--
We would like you to be our choreographer for the following reasons.
translation.zh:
‎我们希望你能当我们的编舞
‎原因如下

translation.en: One. According to my research of every dance movie ever made,
translation.zh: ‎首先 根据我对所有舞蹈电影的研究

translation.en: we have a very important ingredient for winning: a can-do spirit.
translation.zh:
‎我们拥有取胜的重要因素
‎积极进取的精神

translation.en: [chuckles] That's uh… not how dance works.
Well, that's why we would need you.
No, I'm good.
Okay. Number two.
Um, this is your chance to overcome your demons,
translation.zh: ‎这是你战胜内心恶魔的机会

translation.en: due to your… knee injury.
Don't come back here.
Okay, fine. We'll just win the Work It Dance Competition without you, then.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 那我们就只能抛弃你
‎自己去赢得飙舞追梦大赛了

translation.en: And you won't go insane, you know,
being slowly eaten up by all that unrealized potential.
translation.zh:
‎因为尚未实现的潜力
‎在将你慢慢吞噬

translation.en: Wait. Hold up.
-Can-do spirit. -Mm-hm.
What about skill?
-We're extremely skilled. -[laughs] I can spot a fake anywhere.
translation.zh: ‎我们的舞技超炫的 ‎我一眼就能认出冒牌货的

translation.en: Then you must know that I'm the real deal.
You dance? How long?
-Since I was ten. -Influences?
Paul Taylor, Ashley Everett,
translation.zh: ‎保罗泰勒 阿什利埃弗雷特

translation.en: -Travis Wall-- -Look at you.
The way you carry yourself, your posture. You're…100% not a dancer.
translation.zh:
‎你的举止 你的姿势
‎你肯定不是舞者

translation.en: I still have time to learn.
Why would you enter a competition
translation.zh:
‎你都不会跳舞
‎为什么要参加跳舞大赛？

translation.en: -when you don't know how to dance? -Fair question.
translation.zh:
‎你都不会跳舞
‎为什么要参加跳舞大赛？ ‎问得好
‎我可能是对杜克大学招生老师撒谎了

translation.en: So I may have lied to the Duke college admissions officer,
translation.zh:
‎问得好
‎我可能是对杜克大学招生老师撒谎了

translation.en: which means now I have to put my money where my mouth is.
translation.zh: ‎这就意味着 我必须说到做到

translation.en: Give up.
Go to community college. I-I can't help you.
translation.zh: ‎去社区大学吧 我帮不了你

translation.en: I don't give up.
[Quinn] Check it out. I made flyers.
Okay. So, hey, the Thunderbirds have the best dancers at the school, right?
translation.zh: ‎（免费零食！） ‎所以雷鸟有全校最棒的舞者 对吧？

translation.en: At least the ones who auditioned.
-So we need to find-- -The diamonds in the rough.
translation.zh:
‎-所以我们需要找到…
‎-未经加工的钻石

translation.en: I was gonna say, "The ones who don't audition."
But yeah, okay.
So there's this girl in my homeroom, all right?
translation.zh: ‎我的教室里有一个女孩 好吗？

translation.en: She makes these dance videos
and posts them on Instagram. Check it out.
translation.zh: ‎发布到照片墙了 你来看看

translation.en: Um… I don't know, Jas. She seems… intense.
translation.zh: ‎我说不好 杰斯 她看起来…很有激情

translation.en: -She can dance. -["When I Get Going" by KALLICO playing]
[goth girl] I don't believe in teams.
Did you know that Friedrich Nietzsche was the starting number ten
translation.zh:
‎你知道吗？
‎弗里德里希尼采在他18岁时

translation.en: for the German national football team when he was 18 years old?
translation.zh: ‎是德国国家足球队第10号首发队员

translation.en: Yeah, apparently that experience influenced a lot of his later work.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 显然那次经历
‎影响了他后来的很多作品

translation.en: -♪ La la la, oh-oh ♪ -I don't really know what's going on here, -but take this. -♪ La la la, oh-oh ♪
translation.zh:
‎我不太清楚是什么情况
‎不过给你传单吧

translation.en: Hm-mm. I see you. You got some moves.
translation.zh: ‎我看过你 你的舞步很厉害

translation.en: That's my victory dance.
Okay, see, I didn't wanna be the one to tell you this, but you suck at soccer.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 我本来不想告诉你的
‎但你踢得太烂了

translation.en: -No, I don't. -Yeah, you do.
Yeah, well, you see, I ran the numbers,
translation.zh: ‎是啊 你要知道 我算了一下

translation.en: and the odds of the team actually playing you this season
translation.zh: ‎这个赛季 球队让你参赛的比率

translation.en: are ten to one, so…
Great practice, man!
-Ouch. -Woof. Yeah, that was painful to watch.
translation.zh:
‎-哎哟
‎-唉唉 ‎是啊 看着都很悲哀

translation.en: So you should be on a team that really respects your talent.
translation.zh:
‎你应该加入一个
‎真正尊重你天赋的团队

translation.en: And first, you should start by doing something you're really good at.
translation.zh: ‎首先 你应该从做你擅长的事情开始

translation.en: ♪ When I get goin'… ♪
[Jas] Everybody calls this kid DJ Tapes
because he makes the hottest mix tapes around.
But what they don't know is that he's got some serious moves.
translation.zh: ‎但大家不知道 他的舞步也很厉害

translation.en: Yeah, this guy is supposed to be the best flipper in town.
translation.zh: ‎没错 他是附近最厉害的空翻舞者

translation.en: [Quinn] He's, like, 50.
[Jas] No, not him. The one that looks like Conan O'Brien.
translation.zh:
‎不是他啦
‎是看起来像柯南奥布莱恩那人

translation.en: The guy can flip.
-It's not true. -[Jas] Mm… that's not what I heard.
I did one flip one time in eighth grade at Ryan Goodman's pool party.
translation.zh: ‎八年级时 我空翻过一次 ‎是在瑞安古德曼的泳池派对

translation.en: -I heard it was perfect. -I don't even remember how I did it.
translation.zh:
‎-据说动作很完美
‎-我都忘记怎么做的了

translation.en: Right, but you did it once, which means you can do it again.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 但你做过一次 就能再做一次

translation.en: It's still somewhere inside of you. We just have to find it.
translation.zh:
‎这是潜藏在你内心深处的
‎需要我们来挖掘

translation.en: You will flip again.
Catch you on the flip side.
[Quinn] Priya and I once did a presentation for physics class.
translation.zh: ‎普丽娅和我曾在物理课上做过演讲

translation.en: She skated in circles while I talked about the theory of centrifugal force.
translation.zh: ‎我谈论离心力理论 她在原地转圈

translation.en: Needless to say, we aced it,
so she totally owes me.
Two, two, three, four, five, six.
translation.zh: ‎二 三 四 五 六

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -I signed up online.
translation.zh: ‎你在这里做什么呢？ ‎我在网上报名的

translation.en: You realize this is a kids' class, right?
Yeah, well, there was no age limit on the website, so…
translation.zh: ‎是啊 但网站上没有年龄限制 所以…

translation.en: Great. You do you.
[Jake] All right, here we go! Six, seven, eight.
translation.zh: ‎好了 开始吧！ 六 七 八

translation.en: One, two, three. [grunting]
We found some great new dancers to join our team.
translation.zh:
‎我们找到了一些优秀的新舞者
‎加入队伍

translation.en: We'd still love to have you choreograph.
-What do you think? -I think you still can't dance.
translation.zh: ‎你觉得呢？ ‎我还是觉得你不会跳舞

translation.en: All right. I didn't want to have to…
show you everything at once, but…
translation.zh: ‎一次性全都展示给你 但是…

translation.en: let's go for it, all right.
Please don't do that.
All right. Well, I still have the animations.
translation.zh:
‎-拜托别这样了
‎-好吧 ‎我还会模仿呢

translation.en: No? Okay. Well, what about this one?
Step… [softly] drop, step…
Uh-huh, you love it. You kinda like it.
translation.zh: ‎爱上了吧 有点喜欢了吧

translation.en: -No? -Ju--
[Quinn softly] I'm stepping…
-then I drop. -Come here.
Stand right there.
Look right here. [chuckles] Okay. Just-- Just follow me.
translation.zh: ‎看着镜子 好了 ‎跟着我来

translation.en: Okay? We're gonna step to the right.
Seven, eight.
Step, drop. Step, drop.
Step, drop-- Make it two movements. Step, then drop.
translation.zh: ‎放下 分两步动作 ‎踏步 然后放下

translation.en: Kind of.
Just keep doing it.
All right, slow it down. Slow it down.
Do you mind?
Take it from the top.
-[emotional music plays] -Seven, eight.
Step, drop. Nice.
translation.zh: ‎七 八 踏步 ‎放下 很好 踏步

translation.en: Step, drop. You feel that?
Step, drop. That's good.
translation.zh: ‎放下 能感受到吗？踏步 ‎放下 很好 踏步

translation.en: Step, drop. More power in your arms. Really bring it to you.
translation.zh: ‎放下 胳膊有点力量 用点力量 踏步

translation.en: Step, drop. Step, drop.
translation.zh: ‎放下 胳膊有点力量 用点力量 踏步 ‎放下 踏步

translation.en: Step, drop. That's good. Step, drop.
translation.zh: ‎放下 踏步 ‎放下 很好 踏步 ‎放下

translation.en: Bring it to you, from out to your shoul-- There we go!
translation.zh: ‎用点力量 带动肩膀…非常好！

translation.en: Nice. Step, drop.
translation.zh: ‎很好 踏步 放下 踏步

translation.en: Step, drop. We're gonna ball change, all right?
translation.zh: ‎很好 踏步 放下 踏步 ‎放下 再来脚掌换步 好吗？

translation.en: Drop, ball change.
[chuckles] Okay. Step, drop.
That's good. Step, drop. Back the other way. Step, drop.
translation.zh: ‎非常棒 踏步 放下 另一侧换步 ‎踏步 放下 然后…

translation.en: Shit!
-Are you okay? -[grunts]
I'm fine. I'm fine. I'm fine.
May I?
[Quinn] I read about acupressure for your knee injury,
translation.zh: ‎我看过按摩治疗膝盖损伤的书

translation.en: and these points were recommended.
Thanks.
Thank you… for the dance lesson.
Yeah, good. Your foot is comfortable,
translation.zh: ‎是的 很好 双脚放轻松了

translation.en: and your seat belt is on. Did you check your mirror?
translation.zh: ‎安全带也系好了 检查后视镜了吗？

translation.en: -What do you see? -Uh… a tree?
Good job. Slow down.
[sighs] So I took on a new extracurricular.
translation.zh: ‎我参加了一项新的课外活动

translation.en: Oh, yeah? What is it?
-Dance team. -Dance team?
That sounds fun. It also sounds very time-consuming.
translation.zh: ‎听着很有趣 也很耗时间的样子

translation.en: Well, Einstein said, "Time is an illusion."
translation.zh: ‎爱因斯坦说 “时间是一种幻觉”

translation.en: Well, Einstein also said, "Worry about your GPA."
translation.zh: ‎爱因斯坦还说 “要小心分数下降”

translation.en: -That's a good one. -Okay, slow down.
Yeah, keep it slow. Good job.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 保持低速 非常好

translation.en: So, um, you think I'm ready to leave the parking lot yet?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得我可以开出停车场了吗？

translation.en: [mom] Definitely not. At least another week.
translation.zh: ‎肯定不行 你还需要再练一周

translation.en: -[Quinn] You said that last week. -Okay.
You are so lucky you missed. Do it again, though. I dare you.
translation.zh:
‎没砸中算你们幸运
‎再来一次啊 我看你敢不敢

translation.en: Eat me.
Kids are disgusting.
Okay, everybody.
You have each been chosen
to be part of a brand-new dance crew.
Name TBD.
What is TBD?
It stands for "to be determined."
translation.zh:
‎就是尚无定论的意思
‎不是舞团名字叫待定 只是…

translation.en: -That's not our real name. It's just-- -The flyer said there would be snacks.
translation.zh:
‎就是尚无定论的意思
‎不是舞团名字叫待定 只是… ‎传单上说会有零食

translation.en: Which are also TBD as of right now.
Okay. Tapes?
-You're doing our music. -Dope.
Raven, you're doing our costumes.
translation.zh: ‎瑞文 你负责做我们的服装

translation.en: How do you guys feel about dead cheerleaders?
translation.zh: ‎你们觉得亡灵啦啦队怎么样？

translation.en: -Quinn, you're doing our costumes. -I can do that.
translation.zh:
‎-奎因 你来负责服装吧
‎-可以有

translation.en: It says here "choreographer," and then it's blank.
translation.zh: ‎这里写着“编舞” 然后是空白

translation.en: Okay, um… might as well get into it.
I'm going to get... Jake Taylor to be our choreographer.
translation.zh: ‎我要请杰克泰勒做我们的编舞

translation.en: -Didn't he die? -No. Here I am, alive and well.
translation.zh:
‎-他不是死了吗？
‎-没呢 ‎我在这呢 活得好好的

translation.en: Look, um, I'm not gonna waste my time and name if you end up sucking,
translation.zh:
‎我不想浪费我的时间和名声
‎万一你们搞砸了呢

translation.en: but I will make you a deal, okay?
translation.zh: ‎但我要跟你们做一个交易 好吗？

translation.en: If you guys can make it past qualifiers on your own…
translation.zh: ‎如果你们能凭借自己 通过资格赛

translation.en: I'll choreograph for you.
And if you need a place to rehearse for now, you can come to my studio.
translation.zh:
‎如果你们现在需要排练的地方
‎可以来我的舞蹈教室

translation.en: As long as my boss isn't around, then you can do your thing there for free.
translation.zh: ‎只要我的老板不在 ‎就可以免费提供给你们

translation.en: Wow, okay. Quick question.
translation.zh: ‎哇哦 好的 快问快答

translation.en: So, you drove all the way here
just to tell us that you weren't going to waste your time on us?
translation.zh:
‎就为了告诉我们
‎不愿意在我们身上浪费时间吗？

translation.en: Yeah, well, I-I wasn't doing anything right now. That's why… I could come.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 我现在也没什么事做 ‎所以我才有时间来

translation.en: But generally, I stay pretty busy.
translation.zh: ‎但通常来说 我还是很忙的

translation.en: We'll just drop it.
Well, I'm gonna go.
But... uh, yeah, the studio-- Just come around back when we close.
translation.zh:
‎不过舞蹈教室的事
‎等我们关门 你们可以过来

translation.en: I have no clue. Roman left his shoes again, so…
translation.zh:
‎是啊 我也不知道
‎罗曼又把鞋忘在这里了 所以…

translation.en: -Figure it out. -Figure that out. Okay, bye.
translation.zh:
‎-你来解决吧
‎-交给我吧 好的 拜拜

translation.en: -Come on! -Sweet!
Oops, my shoe.
What are we doing here?
What?
I need a new mattress.
I think it could add a nice little feng shui.
Oh, that mattress.
-You need to get some game, Quinn. -What do you mean by that?
translation.zh:
‎-你要勇敢一点 奎因
‎-什么意思？

translation.en: You think I don't see you staring at Jake like he's a pop quiz?
translation.zh:
‎你以为我没看到你盯着杰克的样子？
‎像是在看突击测验

translation.en: -Untrue. -You just need to ask him out.
-I don't even know how to do that. -It's easy!
Just play it cool.
Like, check this out.
-[Jas] Hi. -[Quinn] Oh my God.
[salesman] I'll circle around and be with you in a few minutes.
translation.zh: ‎我再转一圈 过一会再回来

translation.en: All right.
Hey.
Sorry about the wait. H-How can I help you guys?
translation.zh:
‎嘿 抱歉久等了 ‎-你们需要什么帮助吗？
‎-你好呀

translation.en: Hi there. I am uh… looking for a new mattress.
translation.zh:
‎-你们需要什么帮助吗？
‎-你好呀 ‎我想买新床垫

translation.en: Okay, great.
translation.zh: ‎好啊 那你就来对地方了

translation.en: -Well, you came to the right place. -I did, didn't I?
translation.zh: ‎好啊 那你就来对地方了 ‎是哦 是吧？

translation.en: -Must be Mr. Right. -[laughs]
So, what are you thinking about,
translation.zh: ‎在硬度方面 你有什么要求？

translation.en: -in terms of firmness? -So many things.
translation.zh: ‎在硬度方面 你有什么要求？ ‎那就太多了

translation.en: Jesus.
Would you mind? I wanna test the spoon-worthiness -of this mattress. -Um…
translation.zh:
‎你介意吗？
‎我想测试一下床垫的耐用度

translation.en: My friend here will move out of the way. Quinn?
translation.zh: ‎我的朋友可以躲开的 奎因？

translation.en: Why don't you just plop on down?
-Just a tad. -[salesman] Yeah, okay. Sure, all right.
translation.zh:
‎-就是测试一下
‎-行啊 没问题 ‎好的 这样测试呀

translation.en: This is how this works.
-Okay. This is… -This is good.
-The firmness is… -The firmness of the bed is good. Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-硬度…
‎-床垫的硬度很棒 是啊

translation.en: [Jas] Firmness of the bed. [salesman] I can't say I've done this before.
translation.zh:
‎-床垫硬度
‎-我以前没这样做过

translation.en: [Jas] This is a full experience.
[Quinn] You know, we still need a name.
translation.zh: ‎要知道 我们需要起名字的

translation.en: I think we should name the team "Jasss," with three S's.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得可以叫“杰斯斯斯” 三个斯

translation.en: We're not naming the team after you.
translation.zh: ‎我们才不会用你的名字起名呢

translation.en: It's not after me.
It's like "Yas, queen,"
but like "Jasss Quinn." It's cute, right?
translation.zh: ‎说成“杰斯女王” 很可爱 是吧？

translation.en: -What about "The Raptures"? -The Raptors are already a team, dummy.
translation.zh:
‎叫做“欢喜升天”怎么样？ ‎-这名字跟另一只队伍很像 傻瓜
‎-不是的

translation.en: No. Like, the Rapture?
It's like… It's like when people get sucked up into the sky,
and the world's about to end. Like, it's really cool.
And all hell breaks loose on Earth, and, like--
translation.zh:
‎天塌地陷 灾难降临 ‎-就像是…
‎-好了 各位

translation.en: we need to perform in front of a live audience before qualifiers.
translation.zh:
‎在资格赛之前
‎我们需要在现场观众面前表演

translation.en: That's true. The Birds practice all the time at pep rallies.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 雷鸟总在赛前动员会上表演的

translation.en: But who are we gonna perform for?
[Quinn] We have our audience!
So this is it?
They're screening Fifty Shades of Grey in the media room.
translation.zh: ‎他们在媒体室放映《五十度灰》呢

translation.en: But I got Harold.
'Sup, Harold? You didn't wanna watch Fifty Shades of Grey?
translation.zh:
‎怎么了 哈罗德？
‎你不想看《五十度灰》吗？

translation.en: -No, he's not allowed to watch it anymore. -Oh.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 他们不允许他再看了

translation.en: Not after what happened last time. Right, Harold?
translation.zh: ‎就因为上次的事 对吧 哈罗德？

translation.en: Yeah.
Okay, come on guys! Let's do this.
What happened last time?
Did he just fall asleep to Big Freedia?
translation.zh: ‎他听着比格福瑞达睡着了吗？

translation.en: No… No, he's-- Harold?
Harold, did you-- Did you like it?
Pretty sure the key to a live audience is keeping them alive.
translation.zh:
‎我敢肯定
‎现场表演的关键是让观众活下去

translation.en: Poor Harold.
Why? Death comes to us all.
You know, it could have been completely unrelated to our performance.
translation.zh: ‎这可能与我们的演出完全无关

translation.en: Quinn, our terrible dancing just killed a man.
translation.zh:
‎奎因 我们跳得太烂
‎把那人都害死了 好吗？

translation.en: All right? The sooner we face that fact,
the sooner we can ask for forgiveness and move on with our lives.
translation.zh: ‎就能越早请求原谅 继续我们的生活

translation.en: Well, then we need to work harder.
-[ambulance siren blares] -Come on. Let's go.
Okay. Hey, Tapes? Would you mind playing a beat?
translation.zh: ‎很好 泰普斯？ ‎你介意打个节拍吗？

translation.en: Why don't we get up and try a freestyle? We loosen up a little bit.
translation.zh: ‎我们为什么不起来试试即兴舞蹈呢？ ‎我们稍微放松一点

translation.en: -[Quinn] Yeah, okay. Cool. -[Jas] We unbutton a button. Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-是啊 酷啊
‎-松开一颗扣子 ‎是啊

translation.en: -All right. -Let's try this. Hit it, Tapes.
translation.zh: ‎我们试试 开始吧 泰普斯

translation.en: -♪ Na na na na, na na na, na na na ♪ -[dancers whooping]
[all] Go, Robby. Go, Robby. Go, Robby.
Me? Yeah!
Okay, got it.
-You know, feel free to just get loose. -Yep.
translation.zh: ‎没事 随意放松 没错

translation.en: Okay, um…
[Jas] Yeah. Yeah okay.
-Quinn, you just gotta dance how you feel. -This is how I feel!
translation.zh:
‎-奎因 你要跟着感觉跳
‎-这就是我的感觉！

translation.en: All right. Hey, good rehearsal, everybody.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 排练很不错 各位

translation.en: Freestyling is about getting out of our heads,
translation.zh: ‎即兴舞蹈重在摆脱大脑控制

translation.en: and that's what we have to do at qualifiers this weekend.
translation.zh: ‎这也是我们在周末资格赛中要做的

translation.en: Keep working on it.
I'm… gonna go pray.
[Quinn] Ever since my interview, I'd been hoping I'd get into Duke early admission,
translation.zh:
‎自从面试后
‎我就一直希望能被杜克大学提前录取

translation.en: but the night before qualifiers,
translation.zh: ‎但是在资格赛的前一天晚上

translation.en: I got an e-mail saying
that there would be no decision on my application until the spring.
translation.zh: ‎说我的申请要到春天才会有结果

translation.en: Ms. Ramirez was nice enough to include a personal note.
translation.zh:
‎拉米雷兹非常好心
‎还附上了一封私人信件

translation.en: "Can't wait to see you dance at Work It!"
translation.zh:
‎“等不及要看
‎你在飙舞追梦大赛的表现了！”

translation.en: Yay.
♪ To stay and give it tonight ♪
Hello.
We signed up online.
Name?
TBD.
It's just temporary.
Changing rooms are in the back.
Thank you very much.
All right. Let's go, guys. Come on.
translation.zh: ‎好了 我们走吧 各位 走吧

translation.en: [Jas] What was that? Yeah, that's a good idea. I'll tell him. You go ahead.
translation.zh:
‎什么？好主意呢
‎我去告诉他 你们先去吧

translation.en: Hey, there, again. Uh, group consensus.
Our new name is "Jasss Quinn."
translation.zh: ‎我们的新名字叫“杰斯斯斯皇后”

translation.en: -That is J-A-S-S-S Quinn-- -TBD. Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-杰三个斯皇后
‎-待定 谢谢

translation.en: -"Jasss Quinn." -[crowd applauding]
Why do we look like a bunch of dental hygienists?
translation.zh: ‎为什么我们看起来像一群牙医？

translation.en: What? They're uniforms. I borrowed them from the nursing home.
translation.zh:
‎怎么了？这是他们的制服
‎我从养老院借的

translation.en: We look like we're about to go run a blood drive.
Remind me to never to put you in charge of costumes ever again.
translation.zh: ‎提醒我别再让你负责服装了

translation.en: -Never worn a color before. -For the record, they were free.
translation.zh: ‎从没穿过有颜色的衣服 ‎要知道 这可是免费的

translation.en: Nice costumes. Scrubs, very appropriate.
translation.zh: ‎很棒的服装 刷手服 很合适呢

translation.en: What are you guys doing here?
Yeah, what? Returning champions don't have to qualify.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 上届冠军不用参加资格赛呀

translation.en: Riri's on an Instagram break, so I thought I'd come and watch a train wreck.
translation.zh:
‎蕾哈娜最近不发照片墙了
‎所以我想来看看火车失事

translation.en: And pretty soon, we're gonna have two things to celebrate.
translation.zh: ‎我们很快就能有两件值得庆祝的事了

translation.en: One being your elimination.
And Juilliard's auditioning for Juilliard -this weekend. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎茱莉亚周末要去茱莉亚音乐学院面试

translation.en: -Trinity, I told you not to say anything. -You literally told me to say that.
translation.zh:
‎-崔妮蒂 告诉你不要说呢
‎-是你让我说的呀

translation.en: Anyway, yes, my presence has been requested.
translation.zh: ‎总之呢 是的 他们让我去参加呢

translation.en: I guess they just want to see what all the fuss is about.
translation.zh: ‎估计他们想看看 为什么能如此轰动

translation.en: Anyway, break your legs.
[female announcer] Next up, we have a new dance team from Woodbright High: TBD.
translation.zh: ‎接下来是亮木高中的新舞团 待定

translation.en: -Well, this should be interesting. -["Rent" by Big Freedia playing]
-They'll never make it. -[Trinity] No.
[female announcer] That was TBD from Woodbright High.
translation.zh: ‎刚才是亮木高中的待定舞团

translation.en: And now for the judges' scores.
We have a six, a five, and a five.
translation.zh: ‎分数分别是六分 五分和五分

translation.en: Seems a little high for that.
At least nobody died this time.
Five, five, six. Is that good?
Um, it's between us and the next crew performing,
translation.zh: ‎胜负要看下一组表演的舞团了

translation.en: so… if we beat them, then we're in.
translation.zh: ‎所以…如果能战胜他们 我们就晋级了

translation.en: -Raven are you-- Are you crying? -No!
Oh God, please suck, please suck, please suck. Good luck!
translation.zh: ‎天啊 拜托糊掉 保佑啊！

translation.en: [female announcer] Next up from Big Bend High School, please welcome Rock Solid.
translation.zh: ‎接下来是大本德高中的坚如盘石舞团

translation.en: They're really good.
Are-- A-Are you seeing what I'm seeing?
Boner.
Oh my God.
I think I made direct eye contact.
-Wait. He's not wearing a dance belt. -Yeah, no shit, honey.
translation.zh: ‎等等 他没系舞蹈腰带 ‎是啊 没有呢

translation.en: No, I mean the Work It code of conduct states
translation.zh:
‎不是 飙舞追梦大赛规则要求
‎所有男性成员

translation.en: that all male team member are required
translation.zh:
‎不是 飙舞追梦大赛规则要求
‎所有男性成员 ‎在表演时 必须系舞蹈腰带

translation.en: -to wear a dance belt during performances. -Wait. So this means…?
translation.zh: ‎在表演时 必须系舞蹈腰带 ‎等等 也就是说…？

translation.en: It means we're in.
We're in.
I sucked at qualifiers.
translation.zh: ‎我在资格赛 表现烂到透了

translation.en: I'm not kidding. When the judge held up his scorecard,
translation.zh: ‎我没开玩笑 裁判举起分数牌时

translation.en: this one was just looking into my soul.
-Just directly into my soul. It was bad. -Come on, I'm sure it wasn't that bad.
translation.zh:
‎-直击灵魂 太糟糕了
‎-不至于那么糟吧

translation.en: -You guys made it through, though. -On a technicality.
translation.zh:
‎-不过你们还是晋级了
‎-因为技术性问题

translation.en: Well, technically, that counts.
Maybe you can just hide me in the back for Work It.
translation.zh:
‎飙舞追梦大赛时
‎也许你可以把我藏在后面

translation.en: I could never hide you in the back.
Come on. I want to show you this thing Jas told me about.
translation.zh: ‎走吧 我想给你看看杰斯告诉我的事

translation.en: So, what did you think?
It was amazing.
It was amazing. I just…
What?
I miss dancing.
So why'd you give it up?
'Cause I wanted to be the best…
and I wasn't any more, so…
translation.zh: ‎但我不再是最好的了 所以…

translation.en: What?
You're so good. I can't dance at all.
translation.zh: ‎你很棒啊 我都完全不会跳

translation.en: That's because you can't learn to dance by reading a book, Quinn.
translation.zh: ‎那是因为 看书没法学会跳舞的

translation.en: Why is Duke so important to you that you would do all of this?
translation.zh:
‎为什么杜克大学对你那么重要
‎让你愿意做这些？

translation.en: I mean, it's just a school.
My dad went there.
He loved it.
Like, really, really loved it.
I don't-- It wasn't always my plan to go.
But after he died,
I felt like being there would make me connected to him somehow.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得去杜克大学
‎能让我跟他建立某种联系

translation.en: I don't know. Maybe it sounds stupid.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 也许有点傻吧

translation.en: No, it's not stupid, Quinn.
Plus, it's close to home.
You know, my mom wouldn't have to be all by herself. And…
translation.zh: ‎我就不用让妈妈自己一个人了

translation.en: the more that I wanted it, the more that she wanted it.
translation.zh: ‎我越想去那里 她就越希望我去

translation.en: Now she's done everything to help me get this far.
translation.zh: ‎她帮助我很多 让我一路走到现在

translation.en: I feel like I can't let her down.
So are you doing this for her or for you?
translation.zh: ‎你是为了她 还是为了自己？

translation.en: [Quinn] Honestly, I don't really know.
It's just kind of taken on a life of its own now, but…
translation.zh: ‎自然而然就成现在这样了 但是…

translation.en: I have to do it.
I think I know how to fix your freestyle problem.
translation.zh: ‎我知道如何解决你即兴舞蹈的问题了

translation.en: I wanna try something. Give me your jacket.
translation.zh: ‎我想试一种办法 把你的夹克给我

translation.en: O-Okay.
I wanna see if you can just…
react to what I do.
Oh, I don't remember signing up for a dance lesson tonight.
translation.zh: ‎我不记得我今晚报名舞蹈课了

translation.en: You're really gonna turn down a free lesson
translation.zh: ‎你真打算拒绝 ‎全州最牛舞者的免费课程吗？

translation.en: from the best dancer in the state?
translation.zh: ‎全州最牛舞者的免费课程吗？

translation.en: Oh, I would never.
-Do you know him? Is he coming? -[laughs] Okay.
You don't have to be in control all the time.
translation.zh: ‎你不必时时刻刻都在掌控之中

translation.en: You're not studying for a midterm, all right?
translation.zh: ‎你不是在为期中考试备考 好吗？

translation.en: You can't think your way through this.
Quinn, you gotta…
let your body drive you.
Okay.
Show me what to do.
So how's your knee? I read this article in The New England--
translation.zh:
‎你的膝盖怎么样了？
‎我在《新英格兰医学杂志》上看到…

translation.en: [Female TED Talker] One of the first things we learn as children is how to tie our shoes.
translation.zh:
‎小时候 我们首先要学的一件事
‎就是如何系鞋带

translation.en: But did you know that over the course of an 85-year lifespan,
translation.zh: ‎但你知道吗 如果活到85岁

translation.en: you'll spend 517 hours dealing with your shoelaces?
So, we did a study. We gave a group of 100 people clogs to wear, and--
translation.zh:
‎我们做了一项研究
‎给100个人木屐让他们穿…

translation.en: ♪ …working less ♪
Oh, oh. Are you okay? Oh, you're good. Get back up.
translation.zh: ‎你还好吗？没事的 快站起来

translation.en: [Jas] Yeah, you're good. It's okay. That's okay.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 完全没事 没问题的

translation.en: Yes!
[Jas] You're different.
You're glowing.
She's glowing!
Okay, everybody. Let's do this.
translation.zh: ‎好了 各位 我们开始吧

translation.en: Why are we meeting here?
Jake's studio was booked,
and this store is actually equidistant from the studio and the school.
translation.zh:
‎这间商店与舞蹈教室和学校的距离
‎是相等的

translation.en: And it's very… very central to all of our homes.
translation.zh: ‎跟各位的家里 距离也差不多

translation.en: -You're welcome. -I think there's a coffee shop
translation.zh: ‎这条街上好像有一家咖啡店 我们…

translation.en: -down the street. Should we just-- -You know what, Raven, Miss Helpful?
translation.zh: ‎这条街上好像有一家咖啡店 我们… ‎谢谢帮忙 瑞文小姐

translation.en: There is actually a pot of coffee and a water cooler by the memory foam.
translation.zh:
‎记忆海绵床垫旁边
‎有一壶咖啡和一台饮水机

translation.en: Okay, I think we're getting a little off topic,
translation.zh: ‎好了 我觉得我们有点跑题了

translation.en: so I'm gonna let Jake take the floor now.
Okay. Hi, everybody. Hello. Listen up.
translation.zh: ‎好的 各位 大家好 听我说

translation.en: There's less than two months until the competition,
so we're already behind.
And we're going on a technicality.
translation.zh: ‎我们还有一些技术细节问题

translation.en: Bottom line, we have to be better.
translation.zh: ‎至少我们的舞技还要再精进

translation.en: If you wanna be your best, you have to follow your--
translation.zh: ‎如果想做最好的 就要遵从你的…

translation.en: Pecs.
…heart.
-Is she good? Are we good? -Yeah.
-She seems-- Okay. -Keep going. Hey, you.
translation.zh:
‎-她似乎…好吧
‎-你继续说 你呀

translation.en: We're gonna reel it in.
For me?
Look, it's no secret that you guys aren't the most…
translation.zh: ‎听着 人人都知道 你们不是最…

translation.en: technically skilled dancers out there,
but that's what we're up against.
Okay? The Work It stage, it's different. It's-It's-It's huge.
translation.zh:
‎好吗？飙舞追梦大赛的舞台很不一样
‎那是很大的舞台

translation.en: [Jake in speaking background] It's gonna be hard. Very, very hard.
translation.zh: ‎会很不容易的 非常非常不容易

translation.en: -♪ I need ooh la la la la ♪ -[salesman] Jas? Jas?
-Hey. -Hey.
Hey, so my manager told me that you guys gotta leave.
translation.zh: ‎我的经理告诉我 你们得走了

translation.en: Oh. Okay, yeah.
He also told me that you can't come back here anymore
translation.zh: ‎他还跟我说 你们不能再来这里了

translation.en: if you're not gonna buy anything.
-Personally, like, I don't care, but-- -[Jas] No, it's okay. I get it.
translation.zh:
‎-其实我不介意的 但是…
‎-没事的 我懂的

translation.en: Thank you for letting us be here, though.
On the other hand, if you ever need anything, you just call me.
translation.zh:
‎不过如果你需要什么
‎可以打电话给我

translation.en: That's my card, my personal number.
translation.zh: ‎这是我的名片 我的电话号码

translation.en: -I will. It'll be mattress-related. -All right. I'll hold you to that.
translation.zh: ‎好的 有床垫需求 我就找你 ‎好的 等着你哦

translation.en: I will use this.
Let's roll out.
translation.zh: ‎好了 我们走吧 不过我需要再坐一会

translation.en: -I'm gonna sit here for a second. -[Raven] That was weird.
translation.zh: ‎好了 我们走吧 不过我需要再坐一会 ‎好吧 太古怪了

translation.en: [Quinn] "Dear Ms. Ramirez, thank you for the update on my application.
translation.zh: ‎“亲爱的拉米雷兹老师 ‎谢谢您告知我申请的进展

translation.en: I have a confession to make. I am not a Thunderbird.
translation.zh: ‎我要跟您坦白 我并不是雷鸟的人

translation.en: I have started my own dance team,
led by award-winning choreographer Jake Taylor.
We'll be performing at the Work It Dance Competition in a few weeks.
translation.zh: ‎几周后 我们要在飙舞追梦大赛表演

translation.en: See you there, and hopefully again in the fall at Duke.
translation.zh: ‎到时候见 也希望秋天能在杜克再见

translation.en: -Sincerely, Quinn Ackerman." -[laptop swooshes]
-Good morning. -Good morning.
Is it just me or have you grown, like, two inches in the last two weeks?
translation.zh:
‎是我看错了
‎还是你这两周长高了两英寸？

translation.en: I think it's just posture, Mom.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得只是姿势问题 妈妈

translation.en: So, I was thinking, who do we know that went to Duke that could help us?
translation.zh:
‎我一直在想 我们认识哪位杜克校友
‎能帮助我们？

translation.en: I don't need anyone's help.
I just don't understand why they're taking so long.
translation.zh: ‎我搞不明白 为什么还没有消息

translation.en: Didn't she say you were like a shoo-in?
No, you said I was a shoo-in.
She said I would make an excellent addition.
translation.zh: ‎她说我很符合杜克大学的标准

translation.en: Either way, they should not lead you on like that.
translation.zh: ‎无论如何 他们都不应该那样引导你

translation.en: -I've got it covered. Don't worry. -Why are you so chill about this?
translation.zh:
‎-尽在掌握啦 别担心
‎-你为什么这么淡定？

translation.en: I just realized I have to go. I'll see you later.
translation.zh: ‎我突然想到 我得走了 回头见

translation.en: Bye. Oh, you know what?
My gynecologist is a Dukie.
translation.zh: ‎我的妇科医生是杜克毕业的

translation.en: Jake Taylor?
It's definitely him.
So hot.
Great.
So Jas is dancing to Jake Taylor's choreography.
translation.zh: ‎所以杰克泰勒要给杰斯编舞了

translation.en: God, this is exactly what I needed today.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 这正是我今天想要听到的

translation.en: [Brit] What happened with your Juilliard audition?
translation.zh: ‎茱莉亚音乐学院的面试怎么样？

translation.en: Oh, I don't know, Britney. Why don't you mind your damn business?
translation.zh:
‎我不知道 布瑞特
‎你还是管好自己的事吧

translation.en: Sorry, it's just that they said conservatory dancing is different,
translation.zh:
‎对不起 只是他们说
‎学院舞蹈是不一样的

translation.en: and if I want to be taken seriously,
I would need to learn to control my fire.
[Brit] Oh, it's okay.
[Brit] I'm so sorry.
Wait. What? Don't be sorry for me. Be sorry for them.
translation.zh:
‎等等 什么？
‎不要为我遗憾 是他们的遗憾

translation.en: Yeah, I would die before I extinguish my flames for some stuffy-ass school.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 那种古板的学校
‎我才不会为了他们压抑自己的激情

translation.en: You don't want this? You don't want that?
translation.zh: ‎不想要这样吗？不想要这样吗？

translation.en: You don't want this fire? Your loss.
translation.zh: ‎不想要我的激情吗？那是你的损失

translation.en: Their loss.
translation.zh:
‎-他们的损失
‎-你知道谁不是茱莉亚毕业的吗？

translation.en: You know who else didn't go to Juilliard? Cardi B.
translation.zh:
‎-他们的损失
‎-你知道谁不是茱莉亚毕业的吗？ ‎卡迪B

translation.en: Bruno Mars, Jamiroquai, Janelle Monáe, Janet Jackson, Oprah, Obama.
translation.zh:
‎布鲁诺马尔斯 杰米罗奎 加奈尔莫奈
‎珍妮杰克逊 奥普拉 奥巴马

translation.en: Lots of people.
So I'm fine.
Do we still call him Juilliard?
[woman] Quinn, you can do better than this.
translation.zh: ‎奎因 你的成绩不该是这样的

translation.en: [Jas] Dude!
Robby can flip!
-[mouths word] -[Jas] He flipped!
Robby! Whoo! [laughing] [Jas] Come on! Come on!
[Juilliard] All right. Now that we've saged the space,
translation.zh: ‎好了 我们给这里焚过香了

translation.en: let's try to adjust this terrible lighting.
translation.zh: ‎试着调整一下糟糕的灯光吧

translation.en: Brit, Trinity, can you help me find the switches, please?
translation.zh:
‎布瑞特 崔尼蒂
‎能帮我找找开关在哪吗？

translation.en: Where's Jake?
What are you doing here?
-We booked the studio. -[Quinn] What?
You know you have to actually pay to use a dance studio, right?
translation.zh: ‎使用舞蹈教室需要花钱 你知道吧？

translation.en: Otherwise, people get fired.
Jake!
Are you kidding me?
-Jake, everything's gonna be okay. -How?
translation.zh:
‎-杰克 一切都会没事的
‎-怎么可能？

translation.en: How is it gonna be okay?
Quinn, I just got fired.
I need this job. How am I gonna pay my rent?
translation.zh: ‎我需要这份工作 不然怎么付房租？

translation.en: Shit.
Is that how you want to play this, you little psychopath?
translation.zh: ‎你想这么玩吗 你是神经病吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] Your outburst is really eating into our rehearsal time, sweetie.
translation.zh:
‎亲爱的 你的愤怒
‎占用我们的排练时间了

translation.en: You seriously felt so threatened by us that you had to sabotage our team?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得我们是威胁
‎必须破坏我们的团队吗？

translation.en: I didn't do anything. You do that all on your own.
translation.zh: ‎我什么都没做 是你们咎由自取

translation.en: See, I still remember when we were freshmen,
translation.zh: ‎听着 我还记得我们高一的时候

translation.en: and you didn't make the Birds.
But you begged,
and you did the seniors' homework and washed their cars.
translation.zh: ‎帮他们做作业 帮他们洗车

translation.en: Flank me. Flank me, flank me.
You know, a lot's changed, Jas. Now everyone washes my car.
translation.zh: ‎你要知道 很多事情都变了 杰斯 ‎现在是别人替我洗车了

translation.en: It's so clean, you could eat sushi off it. I did it once.
translation.zh:
‎-超级干净 都可以盛寿司吃
‎-我用过一次

translation.en: Well, enjoy your poke off your Prius while you can.
translation.zh:
‎那就趁着还有机会
‎赶紧用普锐斯吃你的寿司吧

translation.en: This is not over.
And you look like a tampon commercial.
translation.zh: ‎你们看着像是卫生棉的广告

translation.en: Let's go.
[Jas] Oh, ho, it's on now. -Oh, we're taking him down. -[Tapes] Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah.
translation.zh: ‎要开始正面交锋了 我们要打倒他们

translation.en: Hey. Where's Jake?
[Quinn] Over the next few days, I reached out to Jake a bunch of times,
translation.zh: ‎接下来几天 我联系过杰克几次

translation.en: and I waited for him to text me back, but he never did.
translation.zh: ‎我在等他回短信 但没有等到

translation.en: Meanwhile, all the time I had put into the dance team had wrecked my GPA.
translation.zh:
‎与此同时 练舞耗费很多时间
‎让我的成绩直线下降

translation.en: And that's when I got the e-mail.
translation.zh: ‎这时候 我收到了那封邮件

translation.en: "As of January 22nd, I will no longer be working
translation.zh: ‎“从1月22日起 我将不再继续

translation.en: in the Duke University admissions department.
If this is in regards to an application, please contact our office directly."
translation.zh:
‎有任何申请事宜
‎请直接联系我们的办公室”

translation.en: What?
[repeating] No.
[Ms. Ramirez] -Hello? -Thank God. Hi!
Ms. Ramirez, it is-- It's Quinn Ackerman from Woodbright High.
translation.zh:
‎拉米雷兹老师
‎我是亮木高中的奎因艾克曼

translation.en: Uh, you probably don't remember me. I'm the dancer.
translation.zh: ‎你可能不记得我了 我是那位舞者

translation.en: Oh yeah, the illuminator. How ya doin'? You keeping it lit?
translation.zh:
‎是哦 照明者
‎你怎么样？在继续让舞台发光吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Um, so, I saw the e-mail that you sent.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 我看到你发来的邮件了

translation.en: What's that about? What's happening over there?
Yeah. I'll tell you what's happening here… Nothing.
translation.zh: ‎是哦 我来跟你说说 什么事都没有

translation.en: [Quinn] What happened to… shaking things up?
Yeah. You know what? They really weren't into that.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 你知道吗 他们不感兴趣呢

translation.en: What can I say? I tried.
[Quinn] You tried?
I learned how to dance.
[Ms. Ramirez] I'm sorry. Wait. What did you say?
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 等等 你刚才说什么？

translation.en: I started a dance team for you.
translation.zh: ‎我为了你 组建了一个舞团

translation.en: Good for you, girl. You blew up the box.
translation.zh: ‎厉害啊 姑娘 你把盒子炸掉了

translation.en: No, I blew up my life.
translation.zh: ‎不 我把我的生活炸掉了

translation.en: You didn't blow up your life. You blew up your box.
translation.zh: ‎你没把生活炸掉 你是把盒子炸掉了

translation.en: What does that mean?
-[guard clears throat] -I gotta go.
translation.zh: ‎我要挂了 我都把保安招来了

translation.en: -It's turning into a whole thing. -No, you don't have to--
translation.zh: ‎我要挂了 我都把保安招来了 ‎不行 你不能…

translation.en: Hello?
No.
Shit! Shit!
[mom] A half-day suspension? What if Duke finds out?
translation.zh:
‎停课半天？
‎如果杜克知道了 那可怎么办？

translation.en: I know. I had a bad day, and the dance team--
translation.zh: ‎我知道 我过得很糟 而且舞团…

translation.en: Ever since you started dancing, you have been completely off-balance.
translation.zh:
‎自从你开始跳舞
‎你就完全失去平衡了

translation.en: Your grades have been dropping. You're home late. I...
translation.zh: ‎你的成绩在下滑 很晚才回家 我…

translation.en: I don't understand why you felt the need to have this whole other hobby
translation.zh:
‎我不明白
‎你为什么觉得 需要另外找一项爱好

translation.en: that has nothing to do
with what we've been working towards this whole time.
translation.zh: ‎跟我们一直的努力方向毫无关系

translation.en: Mom, I lied to you.
-What? -I lied because the Duke interview was not going as well as I said it was,
translation.zh:
‎我撒谎了 因为杜克的面试
‎并没有像我说的那样顺利

translation.en: and the admissions lady brought up the Thunderbirds,
so I made her think I was on the team…
translation.zh: ‎所以我让她以为 我是雷鸟的成员

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -…though I only do lighting.
translation.zh:
‎-你在说什么？
‎-虽然我只是负责灯光的

translation.en: So then Jas and I decided to make our own team…
translation.zh: ‎所以我和杰斯决定自己组建舞团…

translation.en: -Stop. -…then today I found out
translation.zh:
‎-别说了
‎-然后今天 ‎我发现招生老师不在那里工作了

translation.en: the admissions lady doesn't work there anymore.
translation.zh: ‎我发现招生老师不在那里工作了

translation.en: I don't understand. So is it over? Is it done?
translation.zh:
‎我不明白
‎所以结束了吗？都完了吗？

translation.en: I still have another month to resubmit my grades,
translation.zh: ‎我还有一个月时间补交成绩

translation.en: but they've gotten…
pretty bad, and the suspension is…
not good.
I'm really sorry, Mom.
Oh, man.
Okay.
It's okay.
We're gonna figure this out.
You're gonna buckle down and focus on your school work,
translation.zh: ‎你先认真学习 专注于学业

translation.en: and you're gonna pull those grades up.
You know what this means, though?
So you're just gonna quit on us? Just like that?
translation.zh:
‎所以你就这样退出了吗？
‎就这样吗？

translation.en: I really need to get my grades up.
Plus, I'm the worst dancer on the team. You guys don't really need me. And…
translation.zh:
‎而且我是舞技最差的
‎你们不需要我的

translation.en: I'm holding you guys back. I'm the weak link.
translation.zh: ‎我在拖你们后腿 我是薄弱环节

translation.en: Yeah. And we stuck by you.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 但我们还是支持你

translation.en: Jas…
I did all of this for you, Quinn.
translation.zh: ‎我做这些 都是为了你 奎因

translation.en: I quit the Birds for you. You begged me to.
translation.zh: ‎我为了你 退出雷鸟 是你求我来着

translation.en: And what? Just 'cause your mom says you have to, you're gonna bail on us?
translation.zh:
‎然后呢 就因为你妈那么说
‎你就要弃我们而去吗？

translation.en: I'm really sorry.
Wow.
For a second, I thought you cared, and you weren't just using all of us.
translation.zh: ‎要知道 我曾以为 ‎你是真心在乎 并不是利用我们

translation.en: I do care. I still care.
translation.zh: ‎我确实在乎 现在也在乎

translation.en: You know, I really hope you get into Duke, Quinn.
translation.zh: ‎我真心祝愿你能进杜克大学 奎因

translation.en: And I hope it was worth losing your only friend over.
translation.zh: ‎我希望这值得你失去好闺蜜

translation.en: Ja-- Jas?
Jas? Jas!
Guys, wh--[exhales]
You don't hate me?
No, I do. I just need to update my Instagram story.
translation.zh: ‎恨的 不过我要更新照片墙

translation.en: Are you filming me right now?
You've been filming this whole time?
Stop that.
That's it. It's over.
Priya Singh, signing off.
Quinn, I saw Priya's Instagram. You can't quit.
translation.zh:
‎奎因 我看到普丽娅的照片墙了
‎你不能退出呀

translation.en: You can't ghost me and then tell me what to do.
translation.zh: ‎你不能突然消失 然后又来说教

translation.en: You're right. I was upset, and that's no excuse,
translation.zh: ‎你是对的 我很难过 这不是借口

translation.en: but you have to listen. Don't walk away from this.
translation.zh: ‎但你听我一句 不要放弃舞蹈

translation.en: They'll be better off without me, okay?
Everyone is counting on you. You can't bail on them.
translation.zh: ‎大家都指望你呢 你不能抛弃他们

translation.en: You're lecturing me about quitting?
Look... I made a promise to my mom.
I don't have time for dance anymore.
And I-- I really don't have time for a boyfriend.
-[music ends] -[TV] Still waiting?
This show's garbage. I like Queer Eye. I love Queer Eye.
translation.zh: ‎这节目太垃圾了 ‎我喜欢粉雄救兵 最爱粉雄救兵了

translation.en: It makes me cry every time. I wish they'd come here.
translation.zh:
‎每次都会感动到哭
‎希望他们能来这里

translation.en: Give me a makeover.
So what's all that, honey?
Um… it's just chemistry, biology.
You shouldn't be spending Friday night in this funeral home reading textbooks.
translation.zh: ‎周五晚上 你不应该来养老院看书

translation.en: You should be out with your friends, getting into trouble.
translation.zh: ‎你应该跟朋友一起 惹惹祸

translation.en: Yeah, well, I've got plenty of trouble and no friends.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 我惹很多祸了 也没朋友了

translation.en: And the only chance I have now at getting into a decent college is…
translation.zh: ‎我现在想要进入一所像样的大学 ‎就只能靠看书了

translation.en: by reading these textbooks.
Look at me. You see that guy over there?
translation.zh: ‎看着我 你看到那边的人了吗？

translation.en: Max Berman. Harvard Law School.
translation.zh: ‎马克斯伯曼 哈佛大学法学院

translation.en: -Argued two cases to the Supreme Court. -Wow.
translation.zh:
‎-在最高法院出庭过两次
‎-哇哦

translation.en: And Penny Kitz ran the cardiology department at UNC.
translation.zh:
‎佩妮基茨 在北卡罗来纳大学医院
‎负责心脏病科

translation.en: And look at them now.
We all end up in the same place… in a nursing home,
translation.zh: ‎我们最终都来到一个地方 养老院

translation.en: falling asleep in front of crappy TV.
And the only memories we have are the ones that were, like, really fun.
translation.zh: ‎我们仅存的记忆 就是那些开心的事

translation.en: You know, the times we spent with our friends,
translation.zh: ‎你懂的 跟朋友一起的时光

translation.en: not the schoolwork or the textbooks.
I talk too much.
I felt it! The thing you were talking about,
translation.zh: ‎我感受到了！你跟我说的那种感觉

translation.en: about getting out of my head and dancing.
translation.zh: ‎摆脱大脑掌控 随性舞蹈

translation.en: I literally was, like, stamping books, and it just started happening,
translation.zh: ‎我本来在给书盖章 突然就感受到了

translation.en: and I got out of my head, and I can dance.
translation.zh: ‎我摆脱大脑控制了 我会跳舞了

translation.en: Quinn, whoa, slow down.
And I'm so sorry. I'm so sorry if I hurt you.
translation.zh: ‎我很抱歉 如果伤害你了 我跟你道歉

translation.en: -It's okay. -No, it's not, 'cause I…
I thought that dancing would get me into Duke,
translation.zh: ‎我以为跳舞能让我被杜克大学录取

translation.en: and Duke was gonna make me happy.
But dancing makes me really happy.
And so do you.
What are the odds of... getting the TBDs back together?
translation.zh: ‎让待定舞团重聚的几率有多少呢？

translation.en: I'm gonna have to see you dance first.
-Yeah. Ready? Start with a little… -Yeah. Go for it.
translation.zh:
‎-是啊 准备好了吗？
‎-是啊 开始吧

translation.en: -Okay, all right. -Just a little…
You got a little swimming something happening here.
translation.zh: ‎游泳的感觉 很有感觉呢 ‎还是非常不错的

translation.en: That's actually really nice.
[Quinn whispering] All right. Come on, guys. Come on in.
[speaking normally] Welcome to your new rehearsal space.
I can feel Harold's ghost in here.
What about all the old people?
Everyone here is usually in bed by 7:00,
so as long as we keep the noise down and don't disturb any of the residents,
translation.zh: ‎所以只要我们小点声 不要打扰老人

translation.en: we can rehearse here in the evenings.
translation.zh: ‎我们就可以晚上在这里排练了

translation.en: -Seriously? -Yeah.
[Quinn] And guys, I know I said I was quitting, but I--
translation.zh: ‎各位 我知道 我说要退出 但我…

translation.en: Nobody believed that.
Yeah. After I heard you crying in the bathroom last week,
translation.zh: ‎是啊 上周听到你在厕所哭泣之后

translation.en: I texted Priya to start stretching again.
translation.zh: ‎我就发给普丽娅 让她继续做拉伸

translation.en: -That's right. She did. -Oh, mm… That's funny. I wasn't crying.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 没错 ‎很好笑哈 我没有哭呢

translation.en: [whispers] It kinda sounded like you.
You know what? Doesn't matter. Doesn't matter.
Let's get started.
Okay, uh, here's the plan.
In the next few weeks,
you're all gonna be learning each other's styles, all right?
translation.zh: ‎你们要学习彼此的风格 好吗？

translation.en: -Five, six, seven, eight. -["Satisfied" by Galantis playing]
Turn that shit up!
Hey.
Quinn, I am on the toilet!
I know, but this is the only place I could talk to you alone.
translation.zh:
‎我知道 但只有在这里
‎才能单独跟你说话

translation.en: Listen, I've made a lot of mistakes over the past few months.
translation.zh: ‎听着 过去几个月 我犯了很多错

translation.en: Can we please talk about this later?
But the mistake I regret most of all is hurting you.
translation.zh: ‎但我最后悔的 就是伤害你

translation.en: -I'm drowning you out with my pee. -[urinating]
Okay, I'm done.
-Look, I'm really sorry-- -[hand dryer whooshes]
-I said I'm so-- -[hand dryer whooshes]
Okay, I'm sorry. Ew, how are your hands still wet?
translation.zh: ‎好吧 抱歉 你的手怎么还是湿的？

translation.en: -God, I miss paper towels. -Okay, listen,
translation.zh: ‎天啊 我好怀念厕纸 ‎听着 待定舞团回归了 杰克回归了

translation.en: the TBDs are in, Jake is in,
translation.zh: ‎听着 待定舞团回归了 杰克回归了

translation.en: and we're still training for the competition.
Look, I understand if you don't wanna come back, 'cause…
translation.zh: ‎如果你不想回来了 我也能理解

translation.en: after the way I acted, I don't blame you.
translation.zh: ‎因为…是我犯错在先 我不怪你

translation.en: But I just want you to know that you deserve to dance
translation.zh: ‎但我想让你知道 你应该跟我们一起

translation.en: with a group of people that actually care about you.
translation.zh: ‎你应该跟关心你的人一起跳舞

translation.en: I'm gonna use the bathroom. I've had to pee this whole time.
translation.zh: ‎我要去厕所了 一直憋着尿呢

translation.en: [Juilliard] I do not know what to say. Absolutely everything you did was a fail.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道该说什么了 ‎你们做的都太失败了

translation.en: Trinity, your levels, they were all over the place.
translation.zh: ‎崔尼蒂 你的水平真是起伏不定呀

translation.en: What was with that thing you did after the third count?
translation.zh: ‎第三拍以后 你那是什么动作？

translation.en: I thought I'd put a little extra stank on it.
Oh… Well, if you could please refrain from stanking up the place,
translation.zh: ‎如果你能克制自己 不要再添乱了

translation.en: that would be lovely.
Well, I thought it looked dope.
Well, thankfully you're not the captain of this team.
Everyone, you can go. And practice, please.
translation.zh: ‎各位 你们可以走了 拜托好好练习吧

translation.en: Work on yourselves.
Jas, stay.
Thank you. I like 'em too.
I took you back because you're good.
translation.zh: ‎我让你回来 是因为你很优秀

translation.en: But we do have corporate sponsorships to uphold.
translation.zh: ‎但我们只能穿赞助企业的品牌

translation.en: It's just a rehearsal.
Well, birds of a feather flock together.
Yeah.
You can go.
Thank you, sir.
Okay, then. Seems like we have costumes figured out.
translation.zh: ‎好了 看来我们已经把服装解决了

translation.en: Now we just need to figure out this name thing.
translation.zh: ‎现在我们要给舞团起名字了

translation.en: -I kinda like TBDs. -Yeah, it's grown on me.
translation.zh:
‎-我还挺喜欢待定的
‎-我也越来越喜欢了

translation.en: What does it stand for again?
To be determined...
which I think really describes us.
-[Robby] You quit the Birds? -[Raven] Wait. So you're rejoining?
translation.zh: ‎你退出雷鸟了吗？ ‎等等 你要回归了吗？

translation.en: You think I was gonna let you guys win Work It without me? Yeah, I'm back.
translation.zh:
‎怎能让你们抛弃我
‎自己去拿比赛冠军呢？ ‎是啊 我回来啦

translation.en: [all chanting] TBD! TBD!
-TBD! -[Jas yells] You say what?
Beyoncé…
Queen Bey…
I pray that you make my feet swift tomorrow.
translation.zh: ‎我祈祷您明天能让我双脚如风

translation.en: May my flow be precise and may my moves have swagger.
translation.zh:
‎让我的舞步行云流水
‎让我的动作昂首阔步

translation.en: In the name of the "Single Ladies" video,
translation.zh: ‎以“单身女士”音乐视频的名义

translation.en: the Lemonade short film, and the Netflix special Homecoming…
translation.zh:
‎以《柠檬水》短片的名义
‎以Netflix特别返校节音乐会的名义

translation.en: I pray.
[Quinn] The next morning I could feel Queen Bey's light shining down on me.
translation.zh:
‎第二天早上 我能感觉到
‎碧昂丝女王的光芒照在我身上

translation.en: I didn't know if I would completely humiliate myself onstage,
translation.zh: ‎我不知道我是否会在舞台上出糗

translation.en: but for the first time, I didn't care.
I felt ready.
[repeating] No. No. We need to talk.
I can't talk right now. I have to go to study group.
translation.zh: ‎来不及了 我得去学习小组了

translation.en: I found this.
-What's that? -Are you kidding me?
translation.zh: ‎那是什么？ ‎你在逗我吗？我还找到这个了

translation.en: I also found this.
translation.zh: ‎你在逗我吗？我还找到这个了

translation.en: Who is… "A-Dollar-Sign-A-P Rocky"?
That's not how you say it--
I'll pronounce it how I wanna pronounce it, thank you.
translation.zh: ‎我想怎么读 就怎么读 谢谢

translation.en: What are you wearing?
These are clothes. I'm going to st-- Library.
translation.zh: ‎衣服呀 我要去图书馆来着

translation.en: Oh, since when do you dress like Shakira when you go to the library?
translation.zh:
‎从什么时候开始
‎去图书馆要打扮得跟夏奇拉一样？

translation.en: Am I an idiot to you? 'Cause I know you're dancing.
translation.zh: ‎你觉得我是傻子吗？ ‎因为我知道你在跳舞

translation.en: -I know you're doing it behind my back. -I understand you're mad.
translation.zh: ‎我也知道 你在背着我跳舞 ‎你很生气 我能理解

translation.en: You have every right to be, but I have to be somewhere in 30 minutes,
translation.zh:
‎你有权生气
‎但我要在30分钟内赶到那里

translation.en: -so if you could just-- -Mad?
You know what? I am upset,
because we had a deal, and you're not going anywhere right now.
translation.zh:
‎因为我们说好的
‎你现在哪里也不能去

translation.en: You are grounded.
-♪ I'm gonna shove it ♪ -Where is she?
Quinn, you lied to me. You blew off your schoolwork.
translation.zh: ‎奎因 你骗我了 你的学业都毁了

translation.en: And I don't care what kind of personal breakthrough
translation.zh: ‎我不在乎你现在有什么个人突破

translation.en: you're having right now. You are not leaving this house.
-Mom? -Yes?
-I'm leaving this house. -No, you're not!
Wh-- Quinn!
What the hell?
No! Whoa! What are you doing? You don't know how to drive a car.
translation.zh: ‎不行 你在做什么？你还不会开车呢

translation.en: I know. I'm sorry. I'm so sorry.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 对不起 我很抱歉

translation.en: I'm really happy, so I think this has to be a good thing, right?
translation.zh:
‎我很开心
‎所以我觉得这样是对的 对吧？

translation.en: Wrong. Nuh-uh. Get out of the car.
I can't. I have to go dance.
I am going to kill you.
-Okay, great! Bye! -[engine revs]
Get out of that car. You don't know how to drive. You're wrong!
translation.zh: ‎快下车 你不会开车 你错了！

translation.en: [mom] Quinn!
It's a one-way street!
You're going the wrong way!
Oh, I gotta call an Uber.
[male announcer] Okay, everybody,
please welcome three-time returning champions
from Woodbright High, the Thunderbirds!
Holy shit!
It's like the Rapture.
Quinn, where are you?
[Quinn] I'm coming, everybody!
Okay, I can't text and drive. I can barely drive.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 开车不能发短信 ‎我还不太会开车呢

translation.en: Oh no! Oh my God!
Pyrotechnics.
Nice touch.
[male announcer] Wow! What a performance from our returning champions.
translation.zh: ‎卫冕冠军的表演真是精彩呀

translation.en: And now for the judges' scores…
9.0! Putting the Thunderbirds in the lead!
Up next, our final team: TBD.
translation.zh: ‎下面是最后一支队伍 待定舞团

translation.en: Quinn's not here. What do we do?
Hey.
You ready?
[all chanting repeatedly] TBD!
Are you Jasmine Hale?
Yeah. Yeah, I am.
I'm with the New York Dance Academy.
I'd love to speak with you about joining our program in the fall.
translation.zh: ‎我想跟你聊聊 秋季来我校就读

translation.en: -I would love to speak with you. -Fantastic.
translation.zh:
‎我很愿意跟您聊聊 ‎-太好了
‎-我等这一天很久了

translation.en: I've been waiting my entire life. [laughs]
-Quinn Ackerman. -Ms. Ramirez! You came.
translation.zh: ‎奎因艾克曼 ‎拉米雷兹老师！你来啦

translation.en: Of course I came. You were so good.
You… You illuminated the shit out of this place.
Thank you very much.
-Yeah, you did. You did that, honey. -[Quinn] Thanks.
translation.zh:
‎-非常感谢
‎-你做到了 ‎你做到了 我得告诉你
‎我给你拿到纽约大学的名额了

translation.en: I gotta tell you, I just got a new position at NYU.
translation.zh:
‎你做到了 我得告诉你
‎我给你拿到纽约大学的名额了

translation.en: Here's my card. I think you might like it there.
translation.zh: ‎这是我的名片 我觉得你可能会喜欢

translation.en: Call me.
[Ms. Ramirez] So good!
How does she keep getting jobs?
Are you Juilliard?
Juilliard? Uh… I don't know her.
My name is Isaiah.
Robby, keep her safe.
Big Apple, baby.
I knew you'd get in!
You did? Why didn't you tell me?
-[both laugh] -Looks like we'll be seeing a lot of each other next fall.
translation.zh: ‎看来明年秋天 我们能经常见面了

translation.en: [sarcastically] Yay.
Your performance today…
was actually not bad.
-Thank you. -Thank you.
I'm really happy for you guys.
I'm so bored of winning all the time, right?
translation.zh: ‎我已经厌倦自己独孤求败了 是吧？

translation.en: Anyway, I just thought I'd come over here and say congrats.
translation.zh: ‎好了 我就是觉得应该来恭喜你们

translation.en: I've changed.
Well…
that was interesting.
-Hm. -So whatcha up to now?
Mm… Well, Mama's getting a new mattress today.
Yeah!
-And it is extra spoon-worthy. -[Quinn giggles]
translation.zh: ‎席梦思床垫 酒杯永远不会洒哦

translation.en: Hi.
I'm pretty sure that we illegally won,
translation.zh: ‎我非常确定 我们的胜利违规了

translation.en: since rule 85 in the Work It code of conduct
says you can't compete if you've already graduated.
translation.zh: ‎如果已经毕业 就不能参加比赛了

translation.en: Aw, look at that! Love is happening all around us, honey.
translation.zh: ‎你瞧瞧呀！ ‎爱情就在身边发生呢 亲爱的

translation.en: We just have to look for it.
Play me something, boo.
[Quinn] In the end, Einstein was right.
translation.zh: ‎到头来 爱因斯坦是对的

translation.en: Dancers are the athletes of God.
And, as it turns out, I'm one of them,
translation.zh: ‎事实证明 我是他们中的一员

translation.en: because it's actually not that hard to find a four-count
or the beat of your own heart.
translation.zh: ‎或者自己的心跳 其实并不难

translation.en: All you have to do is listen to it.
That's all I've got figured out.
The rest is TBD.
